Desc.entry: Provides a wide range of road safety functions in Sheffield, including road safety education for children. Aims to influence attitudes, beliefs and behaviour in relation to road safety. Provides teaching aids and educational resources free of charge. Other services include video library, advice and training for teachers, nurses, police and other professionals. Carries out the design of local safety schemes, safe routes to school, danger reduction schemes, road safety audits and road safety revenue schemes. Also responsible for the National Cycling Proficiency Scheme. Carries out practical child pedestrian training (Kerbcraft).
